<div class="titleCont "><div class="page-title"><div class="title"><span class="flag be w32"></span><span class="flag c24 be "></span><h1><font class="hideIfMobile">2022 &nbsp; »  &nbsp; 106th </font>Ronde van Vlaanderen - Tour des Flandres ME <font class="hideIfMobile">(1.UWT)</font></h1>

<div class="fs10 clr999">DNF = Did not finish<br>
DNS = Did not start<br>
OTL = Outside time limit<br>
DF = Did finish, no result<br>
NR = No result<br>
*0:00 = corrected time<br>
<span class="svg_shirt" data-color="yellow"></span>Rider wearing the jersey<br>
<span class="svg_shield"></span>&gt;50% of race distance in group before peloton<br>
<span class="followbadge">F</span> You are following this rider</div>
